attributes.review: 🔥🌈🧚‍♂️🌸❤️As a former trump supporter I am no longer able to support this Cheeto man after using this app 😡. As soon as I opened it it looked as if it was a printed out, poorly designed, and uncolorful power point. It was extremely hard to navigate and most of what was posted was as trump stated, “fake news”. I am very disappointed with this app and if it was possible to give a lower that one star rating I would 😾😾😾.❤️✨🧚‍♀️🌸🔥
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I opened this app to see the horrid words “keep America great” WHEN IT’S NOWHERE NEAR GREAT. Then once I needed to login, I was met with a mortifying picture of Cheeto Hitler and I was traumatized‼️ Once I saw the picture my phone literally jumped out my hands and DROVE ITSELF to the Grand Canyon to commit F4  🛀 🔪 🩸 because the content in its screen was too much for it to handle. It jumped and shattered to remove the impurities 🤢🤮 that this app sprung onto it. Therefore it deserves this rating. 😌💕
attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting‼️💕

attributes.review: I opened the app and all of a sudden this man popped out from the screen screaming at me to take off my clothes and have sex with him, otherwise he would sue me?! what?! This man is a RACIST RAPIST, seriously this app just advocates for a man who would rather cause war in our country to justify use of force than actually make a difference in this world in the name of progress. BE WARNED, if you download this app you might contract ignorance. Sorry. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: Horrid, repulsive, putrid, actual vomit.

attributes.review: This app almost matches up with how terrible the president is. It took at least 7 hours for this useless app to finally download on to my phone, just show how bad this app is. Even before downloading i was already disappointed. If there was an option to not give a star I WOULD!!! This app is so terrible, hopefully instead of an upgrade it’s completely deleted off the face of the earth;)
attributes.title: Trump Trash

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then my phone started glitching. I thought nothing of it until my phone completely shut off and then when I turned it back on I got a message saying that if I didn’t send them 1 million dollars trumps secret agents would come after me and kill me! So I deleted the app and I’m working on getting 1 million so I can live. Wish me luck and never download this app!
attributes.title: Almost died💀🍊

attributes.review: I was just minding my own business checking the news and the app kicked me out because they found out I was half asian! disgraceful. then a big orange cheeto popped up and kept saying make america great again, implying our country is trash which offended me greatly bc this country became trash because of him but anyways I would give it zero stars if I could. awful fake news and it wouldn’t let me sign up for anything!
attributes.title: HORENDOUS!

attributes.review: this app is so bad . do NOT download it. as soon as u open the app it crashes. the app is so poorly layed out. i dont now who created this app but they need some rethink to do. im not sure why bunker boy felt the need to create an app like he’s actually important or special. how can you be the president and still the biggest joke and disgrace in the country. i cant wait to see you out of office and possibly in jail. #TRUMPOUTOFOFFICE2020😸❤️✨😻🧚🏾‍♀️😹💕
attributes.title: absolutely terrible app

attributes.review: I’ve recently had my phone refurbished. Everything should he in great shape and it HAS BEEN for months. Downloading this app has done something to my phone. My phone was glitching, crashing constantly, I began receiving questionable phone calls from USA numbers, and all of this while the app itself wouldn’t even open! Trash! Awful! Do not waste your time and energy on this app or the little man himself!
attributes.title: RUINED MY PHONE

attributes.review: my phone is absolutely perfect and has had no problems whatsoever until i downloaded this app. the second i opened the app it started glitching and has even completely shut off my phone multiple times when trying to sign up. be careful downloading this app because a few of my friends have also been hacked ever since downloading this. DO NOT TAKE THE RISK. DONT DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: absolutely horrible
